amendment.description: To allow States to permit nonhighway uses in rest areas along any highway.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1742 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 12 - 86. Record Vote Number: 45.

action.text: Amendment SA 1742 proposed by Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S1534-1535; text: CR S1534) To allow States to permit nonhighway uses in rest areas along any highway.
